name: Modern Tray ~ Trees
description:
Rich, warm silver is hand painted with our signature Trees design in translucent greys on our hand crafted serving tray. Luxurious, modern, yet classic and neutral design.

Available in 3 sizes:
Rectangle small 12.25" x 9.25" x 1.75"
Rectangle medium 14.5" x 11.25" x 1.75"
Square large 17" x 17" x1.75"

name: Coasters ~ Trees
description:
Set of 4 coasters, measuring 4"x4", hand made from Baltic Birch, hand painted in a choice of 2 finishes: "Jewel", 4 of the hottest new jewel tone colors, decorated with our signature silver birch Trees design hand painted in warm silver. Or "Metallic", each coaster has a background of warm silver, with Trees hand painted in platinum and warm greys. 
Every coaster is unique.

Coasters are finished in durable, moisture resistant poly-acrylic varnish in satin, for a low-luster look. Modern, chic, whimsical. Great hostess gift, great house warming gift, great holiday gift!

name: Set of 4 Coasters ~ Butterfly
description:
Set of 4 coasters hand made from Baltic Birch.
Hand painted in warm silver background. Choose from gold, copper, bronze, or pewter butterflies.
Backed with cork and finished with poly-acrylic for protection.

name: Placemat 10" Square ~ Butterfly
description:
Stunning hand painted placemats grace your table in style!
One giant butterfly hand painted in warm silver on a choice of rich metallic tones.
Choose from rich copper, chic pewter or luxurious bronze.
Placemats are 10" square, hand crafted from Baltic Birch and backed with cork to protect your table top.
Easy clean finish ~ simply wipe with a slighly damp cloth.
Water-resistant.
Not for use with items direct from the oven.

name: Book End ~ Butterfly
description:
Our book ends are made from sturdy oak, to keep your books nice and tidy. Sold individually, in 4 delicious colors (same as our Butterfly coasters in Jewel), you can mix and match to create your own unique look. 

BUTTERFLY is a modern, minimalist silhouette motif that speaks the essence of Bespoke! Available in all of our products in a vast array of colors, Butterfly represents exactly who we are!


Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Please, no chemicals, ever.

Dimensions: 5" W x 7" D x 7" H

Hand made from oak in Pennsylvania and hand painted in New York City.

name: Coasters ~ Butterfly
description:
Set of 4 coasters, measuring 4"x4", hand made from Baltic Birch, hand painted in a choice of 2 finishes: "Jewel", 4 of the hottest new jewel tone colors and with 4 different butterflies hand painted in warm silver. Or "Metallic", each coaster has a background of warm silver, with 4 different butterflies, hand painted in copper, bronze, gold, and pewter. 

Coasters are finished in durable, moisture resistant poly-acrylic varnish in satin, for a low-luster look. Modern, chic, whimsical. Great hostess gift, great house warming gift, great holiday gift!

name: Set of 4 Coasters ~ Silver leaf/Ocean
description:
Set of 4 coasters hand made from Baltic Birch
Hand painted with acrylic paint and finished with matte poly-acrylic for protection.
4" square, backed with cork.

name: Set of 4 coasters ~ Silver Leaf/Jewel
description:
Set of 4 hand painted coasters.

4" square, hand made from Baltic Birch.
Cork backing.
Hand painted in acrylic painted, coated with poly-acrylic in matte finish

name: Book End ~ Slinky
description:
Our book ends are made from sturdy oak, to keep your books nice and tidy. Sold individually, in 8 fun colors, you can mix and match to create your own unique look. Fantastic gift for the kids. 

 SLINKY is a modern, minimalist design in the spirit of Dali, with giant white numbers sliding off the sides. Choose from eight delicious colors.


Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Please, no chemicals, ever.

Dimensions: 5" W x 7" D x 7" H

Hand made from oak in Pennsylvania and hand painted in New York City.

name: Growth Chart ~ Slinky
description:
Hand painted growth charts to last a lifetime! These heirloom growth charts have squares up along the left edge in one inch increments. At every foot there is a two inch marker. All four sides have a simple routed detail. The measurements begin at 18" high and go up to 5'6"...that's a lot of growing! Record each date of measuring using a permanent marker pen. Hanging is easy! Instructions with each growth chart and every growth chart comes with a saw tooth hanger on the back. Makes a totally fabulous new baby gift or 1st birthday gift

SLINKY is a modern, minimalist design in the spirit of Dali, with giant white numbers sliding off the sides. Choose from eight delicious colors.


Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Please, no chemicals, ever.

Dimensions: 8" W x 3/4" D x 48" H

Hand made from pine in Pennsylvania and hand painted in New York City.

name: Book End ~ Cupcake
description:
Our book ends are made from sturdy oak, to keep your books nice and tidy. Hand painted with adorable cupcakes, and pretty stripes in pink. Sold individually. Terrific gift for the kids. 

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Please, no chemicals, ever.

Dimensions: 5" W x 7" D x 7" H

Hand made from oak in Pennsylvania and hand painted in New York City.

name: Book End ~ Trucks
description:
Our book ends are made from sturdy oak, to keep your books nice and tidy. Vintage trucks in red and green combined with soft blue stripes. Sold individually. Terrific gift for the kids. 

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Please, no chemicals, ever.

Dimensions: 5" W x 7" D x 7" H

Hand made from oak in Pennsylvania and hand painted in New York City.

name: Desk Organizer ~ Metallic Splatter
description:
Keeping track of life's little details is tricky and time-consuming. That's where our divinely simple desk organizer comes in. Quick as a flash, you have somewhere stunning to pop your receipts, mail, pens...those bits and bobs we stuff in our pockets and bags and never quite know what to do with! The next time you are wondering, hmmm, where DID i put that letter from the kids school...you will know exactly! Simply genius, because you are too.  

SPLATTER is a sophisticated and modern hand painted metallic finish: richly aged silver, bronze, copper and gold paint are expertly applied in layers creating a lavish and unique effect. The simplicity is irresistible, eclectic and completely versatile in any interior design scheme.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Please, no chemicals, ever.

Dimensions: 13 1/8" W x 6 1/4" D x 6 5/8" H

Hand made from birch plywood in Pennsylvania and hand painted in New York City.

name: Desk Organizer ~ Trees
description:
Keeping track of life's little details is tricky and time-consuming. That's where our divinely simple desk organizer comes in. Quick as a flash, you have somewhere stunning to pop your receipts, mail, pens...those bits and bobs we stuff in our pockets and bags and never quite know what to do with! The next time you are wondering, hmmm, where DID i put that letter from the kids school...you will know exactly! Simply genius, because you are too.

TREES design is both chic and elegant, while soothing your soul and bringing calm to your busy life. The delicately hand painted and translucent layers contrast perfectly with the rich creamy background. The fine detailing of branches and twigs harmonizes beautifully with the gentle strength of the knotty trunks. You can almost hear the birds singing. 

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Please, no chemicals, ever.

Dimensions: 13 1/8" W x 6 1/4" D x 6 5/8" H

Hand made from birch plywood in Pennsylvania and hand painted in New York City.

name: Desk Organizer ~ Neon Wavy
description:
Attention all moms! We all know keeping track of life's little details is a chore...and helping our kids keep track of their own little details is even tougher! That's where our divinely simple desk organizer comes in. Now you don't have to look at their messy desks any longer...this is your perfect solution...and you get to teach them how to organize and keep a tidy room too....how clever are you? Groovy desk organizers are perfect gifts for tweens, teens and grads.

NEON WAVY is a design especially created for fun-filled, sunny rooms, filled with laughter. This playful hand painted wavy and dotty design glows in neon-bright layers of hot pink, vibrant orange and trendy lime green, layered onto a zinging turquoise background. 

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Please, no chemicals, ever.

Dimensions: 13 1/8" W x 6 1/4" D x 6 5/8" H

Hand made from birch plywood in Pennsylvania and hand painted in New York City.

name: Desk Organizer ~ Metallic Wavy
description:
It feels sooo good to have an organized workspace and a divinely stylish desk organizer will do just that for you. Quick as a flash, you have somewhere stunning to pop your receipts, mail, pens, notes and photos, letting you get down to the business of, well, doing business! Super efficient and hyper-organized...because that's what you are.

Hand painted modern METALLIC WAVY design is rich with textured layers of gold, bronze and copper tones on soft cream background.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Please, no chemicals, ever.

Dimensions: 13 1/8" W x 6 1/4" D x 6 5/8" H

Hand made from birch plywood in Pennsylvania and hand painted in New York City.

name: Magazine Holder ~ Trees
description:
Sliding those piles of slippy, sloppy magazines into a sleek organizer is irresistibly satisfying especially as you whizz through the house doing your every day chores. And it's not just magazines...floppy file folders, photographs, documents work perfectly in here too! This magazine holder is a simple yet utterly practical design, with cut-away sides for easy access. There's a smart little plaque on the back side with a slide in card for efficiently labeling what's inside. Stepping back from your hard work, you can admire your good taste and smart organization as your magazine holders sit beautifully on you clutter free shelves! Well done you! 

TREES design is both chic and elegant, while soothing your soul and bringing calm to your busy life. The delicately hand painted and translucent layers contrast perfectly with the rich creamy background. The fine detailing of branches and twigs harmonizes beautifully with the gentle strength of the knotty trunks. You can almost hear the birds singing. 

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Please, no chemicals, ever.

Dimensions: 3 ½”w x 9 ¾”d x 12 ¼”h

Hand made from birch plywood in Pennsylvania and hand painted in New York City.

name: Magazine Holder ~ Neon Wavy
description:
Teen girls love their magazines...and their photos, and their snippets and cut-outs and all things paper...but tidying them all up, well, not so much! Spotlight on this cleverly designed magazine and paper holder. Slipping those piles of beloved magazines and papers into a snazzy organizer makes "clean-up your room" an absolute breeze for gals who'd much rather be hanging and chatting! What a great gift idea! You are the best mom ever.

NEON WAVY is a design especially created for fun-filled, sunny rooms, filled with laughter. This playful hand painted wavy and dotty design glows in neon-bright layers of hot pink, vibrant orange and trendy lime green, layered onto a zinging turquoise background.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster.

Dimensions: 3 ½”w x 9 ¾”d x 12 ¼”h

Hand made from birch plywood in Pennsylvania and hand painted in New York City.

name: Magazine Holder ~ Wavy Metallic
description:
An efficient office means an efficient business and in these busy, jam-packed days, anything to help is a good thing! A couple of these magazine holders are just what you need close by to pop in your folders, projects and those bits of paper that always seem to swoosh off the desk when the door is opened! And for added pizazz, these come in cleverly coordinating designs to the super-efficient desk organizers you see here. Your office never looked so chic, and yes, efficient too!

Hand painted modern METALLIC WAVY design is rich with textured layers of gold, bronze and copper tones on soft cream background.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Please, no chemicals, ever.

Dimensions: 3 ½”w x 9 ¾”d x 12 ¼”h

Hand made from birch plywood in Pennsylvania and hand painted in New York City.

name: Rectangular Tray ~ Metallic Wavy
description:
Anyone for breakfast in bed? (ahem...Valentine's Day?) How about Daiquiris on the deck? Snacks in the snug? You get the picture! Handy hand painted serving trays are the perfect thing for serving and being served...and make you the hostess with the mostest! Easy to hold with gently shaped handles, they are light and washable (just a wipe with a slightly damp soft cloth is all it takes). Be gone, boring hostess gifts...turn up with one of these Memorial Day weekend in the Hamptons and you will have an all-summer invite!

Hand painted modern METALLIC WAVY design is rich with textured layers of gold, bronze and copper tones on soft cream background.

Painted in non-toxic, no voc, water-based paint and protected with non-toxic, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Please, no chemicals, no dish washing soap, no dishwasher, and no immersion in water, ever. 

Dimensions
Large: 14 ½”w x 11 3/8”d x 2 1/2”h
Medium: 13 3/8”w x 10 3/8”d x 2 3/8”h
Small: 12 ¼”w x 9 3/8”d x 2 3/8”h

Made from solid birch in USA

name: Rectangular Tray ~ Leopard
description:
Bespoke serving trays come in three handy sizes and have gently curved handles for comfy carrying. The sides are 1" high and great for containing spills. Small size is snack-size: perfect for a plate of cheese and a couple of glasses of wine. Medium size tray is good for two bowls and two glasses or six mugs of coffee or glasses of wine. The large tray fits a dinner plate and glass...great for breakfast in bed or movie night.

Funky LEOPARD design has a hand painted background of mottled beige and caramel hues and is covered with funky leopard spots. The edges and underside of this design are chic black. Your guests will roar with delight when you serve them from this tray! We love keeping our fragrance bottles organized on this tray too!

Painted in non-toxic, no voc, water-based paint and protected with non-toxic, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Please, no chemicals, no dish washing soap, no dishwasher, and no immersion in water, ever. 

Dimensions

Medium: 13 3/8”w x 10 3/8”d x 2 3/8”h

Made from solid birch in USA

name: Set of 3 Baby Coat Hangers: "Butterflies and Ladybugs"
description:
Whimsical ladybugs, butterflies, and bumblebees buzz around the sky while below, caterpillars, crickets and beetles scurry in the spring sunshine. Adorable baby gift! Each set contains one of each design shown.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster.

Dimensions: 12”w x ½”d x 6”h
Made from solid shima wood.

name: Set of 3 Baby Coat Hangers: "Cupcake"
description:
Hand painted cupcakes are scrumptious on these baby-size clothes hangers. Adorable baby gift! Design is both sides of each hanger. Pink frosting one side, turquoise the other side. Edging in light pink and dark pink stripes.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster.

Dimensions: 12”w x ½”d x 6”h
Made from solid shima wood.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster.

Dimensions: 12”w x ½”d x 6”h
Made from solid shima wood.

description:
Hand painted pastel butterflies and water-color effect design make these delightful baby-size clothes hangers irresistible. Perfect as a baby or shower gift. Water color design is both sides and along edges of each hanger, butterflies are one side.
Hangers have smooth metal hooks and come in sets of 3.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster.

Made from solid shima wood.

Hand painted funky leopard design on regular size wodden coat hangers. Perfect for a jungle inspired kids room, a sophisticated little girl or a chic mom. 3 hangers per set.
Background color is a mottled beige and caramel, motif is black and caramel leopard spots. Design is all-over.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster.

description:
Hand painted full size clothes hangers are full of peace and love. Each set has one each of 3 designs. Our "Peace and Love" design has a tie-dye paint effect, finished with a white paint motif. 3 different background colors are pink/orange, lavender/blue, and jade/aqua. Far out!

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster.

Dimensions: 17”w x ½”d x 9”h
Made from solid shima wood.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster.

Dimensions: 17”w x ½”d x 9”h
Made from solid shima wood.

name: 3 Hook Key/Jewelry Holder: "Stormy" (Lime green)
description:
These 5" x 7" pine plaques have 3 hand made, wrought iron hooks: the perfect size for hanging keys or jewelry. Hand painted in an array of designs: funky, cute, chic, playful or sophisticated...
This is my funky butterfly design. A hand painted background of blended hues is adorned with one bright and beautiful butterfly for an eye-catching finish. 
Also available with a magenta or turquoise butterfly.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster.

Easy hanging with metal d loop attached to back of plaque and hanging screw included.

100% hand made in USA from pine and wrought iron.

name: Kids Rocking Chair: "Butterflies & Ladybugs"
description:
We can't even begin to tell you how much little tykes LOVE our little rocking chairs! Ours are a traditional design, sturdy and topple-free, and the perfect size for little kids. Curved arm rests, a shaped seat, a shaped back rest, and extra-long rockers are important features of this adorable addition to your little one's room! We love to give kid-size rocking chairs as a new baby or shower gift, and they make an extra-special 1st birthday gift.

This is our beloved "Butterfiles and Bugs" design: Playful and whimsical ladybugs, butterflies, and bumblebees buzz over a distressed paint finish background of turquoise, lime green, sky blue, and yellow. Little accents of wriggly caterpillars, beetles, and cheeky crickets play hide and seek...waiting to be discovered by anyone who can find them!

Also available in our "Royal" and "Bubble" designs and custom designs.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. 

Dimensions: 15" w x 27" h x 20.5" d

Made from pine in USA

name: Kids Rocking Chair: "Royal"
description:
We can't even begin to tell you how much little tykes LOVE our little rocking chairs! Ours are a traditional design, sturdy and topple-free, and the perfect size for little kids. Curved arm rests, a shaped seat, a shaped back rest, and extra-long rockers are important features of this adorable addition to your little one's room! We love to give kid-size rocking chairs as a new baby or shower gift, and they make an extra-special 1st birthday gift.

This is our "Royal" design for little princesses! Hand painted with a pink and lavender diamond design mixed with funky leopard print, and decorative gold swirls add a touch of sparkle to this regal design! Lavender and blue stripes, along with a little distressed pink paint effect add cute accents. Perfect for a "royal" daughter, grand daughter or god daughter!

Also available in our "Butterfly and Bugs" and "Bubble" designs, and also custom designs.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. 

Dimensions: 15" w x 27" h x 20.5" d

Made from pine in USA

name: Kids Rocking Chair: "Blossom"
description:
We can't even begin to tell you how much little tykes LOVE our little rocking chairs! Ours are a traditional design, sturdy and topple-free, and the perfect size for little kids. Curved arm rests, a shaped seat, a shaped back rest, and extra-long rockers are important features of this adorable addition to your little one's room! We love to give kid-size rocking chairs as a new baby or shower gift, and they make an extra-special 1st birthday gift.

This is our oh-so-sweet "Blossom" design: delicate watercolors are intertwined with gentle butterflies, rambling wild flowers, and puffy clouds created with soft, translucent paints. This is an extra-special design that embues calm, tranquility, and love!

Also available in our " Butterflies and Bugs", "Royal" and "Bubble" designs and custom designs too. Please contact us for more info on custom designs.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. 

Dimensions: 15" w x 27" h x 20.5" d

Made from pine in USA

name: Step Stool: "Leopard"
description:
Everyone needs a step stool! Ours is 2 steps up, and super sturdy and safe for little ones and grown ups. Ideal for reaching the sink, helping mommy in the kitchen...or just to add a few extra inches to join in the fun. Great baby shower gift or first birthday gift for toddlers. This one is our funky "Leopard" design and is fun and whimsical. A mottled background of beige and caramel, is covered with snazzy black and caramel leopard spots. Perfect for a jungle inspired kids room, a sophisticated little girl or a chic mom. Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Also available in the following designs:
Dimensions: 14 1/2"Wx12 1/4"Hx111/8"D Made from pine in USA.

description:
Cupcake, anyone?! This super sturdy and safe step stool is covered in cupcakes! Each cupcake is swirled with translucent pink, aqua and yellow frosting and topped with a cherry.
Perfect for helping mommy in the kitchen...or just to add a few extra inches to join in the fun. Adorable baby shower gift or first birthday gift for toddlers.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster.

name: Step Stool: "Vroom"
description:
Everyone needs a step stool! Ours is 2 steps up, and super sturdy and safe for little ones and grown ups. ideal for reaching the sink, helping mommy in the kitchen...or just to add a few extra inches to join in the fun. Great baby shower gift or first birthday gift for toddlers. Hand painted vintage trucks zoom around this one! We love the look of the translucent paint, and the red, blue and green trucks. Whimsical phrases add to the fun of rumbling down the dirt track... "Trucking along...vroom vroom...green light go...beep beep" Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster. Dimensions: 14 1/2"Wx12 1/4"Hx111/8"D Made and hand painted in U.S.A. Also available in the following designs:

name: Half Moon 3 Hook Rack: "Trees"
description:
Perfect hanging solution for dish towels, bath towels, beach towels, school bag, ballet bag, soccer bag...hats, scarves and coats work too: 3 sturdy hand crafted wrought iron hooks secured on a hand painted half moon shaped pine plaque.

Our elegant, simple, and chic silver birch trees are hand painted in delicate and translucent layers on an ivory white background.

Sunken holes for easy hanging. 2 screws and plugs included.

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster.

Dimensions: 17”w x ½”d x 9”h
100% hand made and hand painted in USA. Solid pine and wrought iron.

name: Kids Coat Stand: "Butterflies & Ladybugs"
description:
Every kids room needs a coat stand! Ours is light yet sturdy and the perfect size for little ones. Great for storing dress up clothes, coats, hats and scarves. It has 6 hooks on a swivel top. Turned wood detailing on hooks and body of the coat stand and adjustable feet to allow for uneven floors. 

This is our beloved "Butterfiles and Bugs" design: Playful and whimsical ladybugs, butterflies, and bumblebees buzz over a distressed paint finish background of turquoise, lime green, sky blue, and yellow. Little accents of wriggly caterpillars, beetles, and cheeky crickets play hide and seek...waiting to be discovered by anyone who can find them!

Finished in non-toxic, no voc, water-based varnish for easy cleaning with a slightly damp cloth or duster.

Dimensions: Width at base 22" x 22", overall height 51"
Made from pine in USA
